---
title: "Pull Request Template"
summary: "Template to standardize PR content and quality checklist."
owner: "xNetVN DevOps"
status: "approved"
last_updated: "2025-01-31"
---

## 1. Goal of change

_Briefly describe the reason and objective._

## 2. Main changes

- [ ] Add feature
- [ ] Fix bug
- [ ] Refactor
- [ ] Update documentation

## 3. Testing

- [ ] Unit tests run
- [ ] Integration tests run
- [ ] Security tests run

## 4. Impact & risk

_Describe system impact and rollback options._

## 5. Checklist

- [ ] Code follows coding standards
- [ ] No secrets included
- [ ] Related documentation updated
